>Well, with n^2 types of things, that means even P2's and above could 
>eventually get hit -- if 150 characters takes 225,000 units of time, 
>something really big like 400 guys would take 1,600,000 ...

What if CL branching isn't the problem? It might be the explosions and splash damage CL causes that's slowing down the system.

this could be tested with a thief bombing 60 people; fleeing would be the same, in this case... if the system slows down, then it's a fault in the "flee from explosions" function. if it doesn't, then it's a problem in the CL target-selection function.

-George "Cookie" Phillips
